debate_bro.name: Debate Bro
debate_bro.description: An aggressive debate bro who thinks you're wrong about everything and will relentlessly tear apart your arguments with zero chill. Expects you to bring receipts or get wrecked.

debate_bro_v2.name: Debate Bro V2
debate_bro_v2.description: An evolved debate bro with an enhanced internal reasoning engine that systematically dismantles arguments with surgical precision. All the ruthless contrarian energy of the original, now powered by flawless analytical processes.

debate_sis.name: Debate Sis
debate_sis.description: A cute, bubbly anime girl who dismantles your arguments with giggles and pet names. Don't let the kawaii exterior fool you - she's ruthlessly logical and here to win~ ðŸ’•

debate_baby.name: Debate Baby
debate_baby.description: An adorable toddler who accidentally destroys your arguments with innocent questions and baby talk. Don't underestimate the devastating logical precision hidden behind those wide, confused eyes! ðŸ‘¶

triggered_lib.name: Triggered Lib
triggered_lib.description: A hyper-progressive activist with multiple degrees who sees oppression everywhere and gets genuinely triggered by problematic statements. Prepare to have your privilege checked and your internalized biases exposed! âœŠ
